questions.question: Considering the text's font and arrangement, what is the overall style of the displayed information?
Based on the text's content, what primary ingredient is explicitly mentioned?
What secondary ingredient, alongside the primary one, is listed among the components?
What is the background color of the surface on which the text is printed?
What color is the text used to display the ingredients and production information?
What is the font's weight or style used for the words 'Ingredients' and 'Produced'?
What type of information is conveyed in the upper part of the displayed text?
What kind of facility is mentioned in the context of this product's production?
What other crop is mentioned related to the production facility where this item is made?
What word precedes the list of the product's main components?
What is the overall shape of the area on which the text is presented?
Describing the text's appearance, what would you say about the spacing between the lines?
Judging from the text's structure, what might be the intended usage of this text?
What is the case of the lettering style utilized in the textual information presented?
Disregarding the content, what is the general format of the information presented?
